Major_Arcs.title: Setting the Scene and Initial Conflicts in Ghost Town
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the setting of Ghost Town, establishes initial character interactions within the saloon, and sets up early conflicts related to romance and the town's fate.

sub_scenes.title: Saloon Scene and Romantic Entanglements
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene establishes the saloon setting and introduces initial romantic conflicts and explanations between characters.

narrative_arcs.title: Saloon Scene Setting
The Blonde Woman's Explanation
Conversation Continues - Man's Response and Old Timers' Wisdom

sub_scenes.title: Arrival of Modernity and Threat to Ghost Town
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts focus to the arrival of modern surveyors and reveals their plans to demolish Ghost Town, contrasting with the cowboy's nostalgia and setting up the central conflict of preservation versus progress.

narrative_arcs.title: Cowboy's Farewell and Nostalgic Reflection
Modern Arrival and Ghost Town Observation
Airport Plan and Town Demolition Imminent
Emotional Reaction to Ghost Town's Destruction

Major_Arcs.title: Personal Conflicts and Shifting Loyalties
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the personal and romantic conflicts between Nan and Cal, interwoven with the external threat to Ghost Town. It explores themes of love, duty, and changing perspectives amidst external pressures.

sub_scenes.title: Nan and Cal's Relationship Strain
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene highlights the growing tension and misunderstanding in Nan and Cal's relationship, set against the backdrop of the impending demolition.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Accusation and Cal's Defense
Woman's Reflection on Past Relationship with Cal
Ghost Town Demolition and Woman's Outburst

sub_scenes.title: Business Interruption and Father-Daughter Discord
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces business discussions related to the airport and cattle, further straining Nan's relationship with her father and adding layers to her conflict with Cal.

narrative_arcs.title: Cattle Shipping and Airport Business Discussion
Horses for Construction and Father-Daughter Conflict

sub_scenes.title: Reassurance and Resolve in Romance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on attempts to reassure Nan about Cal's love, but Nan's internal doubts lead to her resolve to seek clarity, initiating a chase and business interruption.

narrative_arcs.title: Reassurance of Cal's Love
Nan's Resolve to Seek Clarity
Chasing Cal
Horse Business Interruption
Business Deal and Commitment

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a heated conversation between Nan and Cal, leading to Cal's departure and Nan's emotional reactions, followed by a time skip and eventual romantic reunion.

narrative_arcs.title: Intense Conversation and Impending Departure
Cal's Departure
Reaction to Departing Horses
Time Skip and Nan's Longing Narration
Cal's Return and Confession of Love

Major_Arcs.title: Weather Crisis and Community Response
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to an external crisis – a severe snowstorm threatening livestock. It portrays the community's reaction, initial despair, and eventual hope through external aid and romantic reconciliation against this backdrop.

sub_scenes.title: Snowstorm and Impending Disaster
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the severe weather conditions and the immediate threat to livestock, setting a tone of crisis and impending disaster.

narrative_arcs.title: Reunion and Unease in the Snow
Arrival at the Snowy Homestead and Weather Report
Concern Over Livestock and Fodder Shortage
Assessing the Snow's Severity and Nan's Concern
Narrative Description of Relentless Snowfall
Cal's Decisive Action to Save the Cattle

sub_scenes.title: Despair, Hope, and Romantic Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays the initial despair caused by the snowstorm, followed by the sudden arrival of aid and a romantic resolution between Nan and Cal against the backdrop of shared relief.

narrative_arcs.title: Indoor Despair and a Glimmer of Hope
Plane Arrives with Fodder
Hope and Romantic Reassurance

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction to Cowtown and Character Studies
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new location, Cowtown, and introduces a new set of characters with ambiguous moralities, focusing on character judgments, immaturity, and evolving perspectives.

sub_scenes.title: Showdown and Public Opinion of Chane Benson
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Chane Benson through a dramatic showdown in Cowtown, showcasing varied public opinions on his character and actions.

narrative_arcs.title: Showdown and Reactions in Cowtown
Debate on Chane Benson's Character
Dismissive Reaction and Age Critique

sub_scenes.title: Jeff and Sally's Conflict over Guns and Role Models
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts focus to Sally and Jeff's sibling dynamic, highlighting Sally's concern over Jeff's fascination with guns and his problematic role models, leading to a tense confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Reminiscing About Jeff's Childhood
Gun Obsession Critique
Confrontation over Gun Cleaning
Lectures and Disobedience
Plea for Decency
Clyde Surratt Admiration
Boasting and Challenge to Clyde Surratt
Violent Threat and Laughter

Major_Arcs.title: Intervention and Misjudgment
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on attempts to help Jeff and Sally's misjudgment of Chane Benson, leading to a dinner invitation and escalating jealousy and violence.

sub_scenes.title: Planning to Help Jeff and Introduction of Mr. Benson
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves Sally and Pete planning to intervene in Jeff's concerning behavior and introduces Mr. Benson, setting up further interactions and misinterpretations.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning to Help Jeff
Reaffirming Love and Duty Towards Jeff
Introduction of Mr. Benson and Sarcastic Remark
Narrative Reflection on Shane Benson's Demeanor

sub_scenes.title: Article Controversy and Dinner Invitation for Benson
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene revolves around the fallout from an article about Chane Benson, Sally's fear, and the decision to invite Benson for dinner to understand him better, leading to escalating tensions.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation about the Article
Sally's Fear and Clyde's Reassurance
Benson's Confrontation and Justification for Staying
Benson Justifies His Stance and Criticizes Clyde
Sally and Surrett Discuss Clyde's Article and Benson's Impact
Considering Inviting Chane Benson for Dinner
Discussing Chane's Skills and Dinner Invitation

sub_scenes.title: Dinner, Jealousy, and Violence
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the dinner invitation leading to a moonlight walk, Jeff's jealous outburst, physical aggression, and Sally's angry reaction, culminating in escalating violence.

narrative_arcs.title: Polite Conversation and Departure for Moonlight Walk
Jeff's Jealous Confrontation
Escalating Aggression and Unwanted Kiss
Sally's Angry Retort and Accusations

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Showdown at the Newspaper Office
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the aftermath of the kiss, Chane's violent retaliation, Sally and Jeff's urgent ride to save Clyde, and the confrontation at the newspaper office.

narrative_arcs.title: Post-Kiss Conversation and Jeff's Justification
Chane's Retaliation and Threat, Sally's Urgent Plea
Desperate Ride to Save Clyde
Confrontation Inside the Newspaper Office

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and New Beginnings
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the immediate aftermath of the newspaper office confrontation, including Chane's departure, Sally's regret, and the establishment of a new partnership at the Clarion.

narrative_arcs.title: Benson's Challenge and Chane's Departure with Clyde
Anxious Wait and Sally's Regret
Headline Change Order
Newspaper Partnership and Sally's Pride

Major_Arcs.title: Shifting Landscapes and New Relationships
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new setting and characters, focusing on ranch life, relationship dynamics, and conflicts arising from new arrivals and ranch troubles.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Conflict and New Boss Introduction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with a physical altercation on the ranch and introduces Steve Daley as the new boss, setting up initial tensions and character introductions.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Gender Insult
Introduction of Steve Daley as the Boss
Discussion of Trouble with the New Boss

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Unease and Ranch Troubles
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Betsy's initial reaction to Steve, her growing unease, and the revelation of ongoing troubles on the ranch, including suspicions of sabotage.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Interaction and Betsy's Unease with Steve
Ranch Troubles and Suspicions of Double K
Trip to Town and Hank's Orders for Betsy

sub_scenes.title: Town Confrontation and Bar Fight Interlude
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Betsy's confrontation in town and interjects a seemingly unrelated bar fight scene, adding to the western atmosphere and highlighting themes of violence.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Fred Bridges at the Store
Bar Fight and Aftermath

sub_scenes.title: Betsy and Steve's Budding Romance and Ranch Decisions
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Betsy's evolving feelings towards Steve, her decision about his employment, and their developing romantic relationship.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Realization about Steve and Ranch Decision
Betsy's Change of Heart and Hank's Suggestion
Betsy's Confession to Steve

sub_scenes.title: Negotiations, Confessions, and a Romantic Pact
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Betsy and Steve negotiating their relationship terms, leading to mutual confessions of love and a pact where Steve gives up his gun for Betsy.

narrative_arcs.title: Negotiating Terms and Gunfighter Identity
Love Confession and a Difficult Request
The Ultimate Proof of Love and a Kiss

Major_Arcs.title: Ranch Conflicts and Escalating Violence
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc escalates ranch-related conflicts, moving towards direct confrontations, violence, and internal reflections on duty and love amidst danger.

sub_scenes.title: Accusations, Threats, and Foreshadowing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with accusations and escalating threats at the ranch, foreshadowing potential violence and setting a tense atmosphere.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations and Demands at the Ranch
Escalating Threats and Betsy's Firm Stance
Reflection on Violence and Foreshadowing of Attack

sub_scenes.title: Desperate Measures and Ride to Devil's Pass
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Betsy's failed attempts to reason with Hank and her desperate plea to Steve, leading to Steve's resolute decision to go to Devil's Pass and Betsy following.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Plea and Hank's Determination
Desperate Plea and Steve's Resolve
Betsy's Contemplation and Impending Action
Ride to Devil's Pass and Ceasefire

sub_scenes.title: Devil's Pass Confrontation and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the confrontation at Devil's Pass, Steve's capture, shooting, Betsy's reaction, and their reunion amidst the chaos, leading to reflections on survival and romance.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Devil's Pass and Initial Confrontation
Capture, Debate, and Shooting of Steve
Betsy's Faint and Reunion with Steve
Relief and Reflection on Survival
Romantic Declaration and Future Together

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Entanglements and Ranch Disputes Resolved
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on resolving romantic conflicts and ranch-related disputes, moving from jealousy and accusations to understanding, reconciliation, and eventual marriage proposals.

sub_scenes.title: Dave and Carrie's Romantic Spat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a new romantic conflict between Dave and a woman (Carrie), stemming from jealousy and misunderstandings, intertwined with flashbacks of ranch disputes.

narrative_arcs.title: Dave's Sulking and Rebuke
Flashback to Curley's Arrival at the Corral
News of Fencing and Range Trouble

sub_scenes.title: Fence Line Confrontation and Ranchers' Response
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the ranchers' direct confrontation at the fence line, escalating tensions with Fred Gordon, and Curley's intervention to prevent violence, leading to the expulsion of the Gordons.

narrative_arcs.title: Ranchers Discuss the New Fence
Confrontation at the Fence Line
Planning to Secure the Herd
Escalating Tension with Fred Gordon
Curley Intervenes to Prevent Violence
Disarming and Expulsion of Fred Gordon and Brother
Aftermath and Assertion of Ranch Ownership

sub_scenes.title: Carrie, Dave, and Fred - Love Triangle Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on resolving the love triangle between Carrie, Dave, and Fred, moving from initial conflict and misunderstandings to confessions, reconciliation, and a marriage proposal.

narrative_arcs.title: Reluctant Friendship and Brotherly Disdain
Defense of Fred's Actions and Implicit Feelings
Confession of Conflicted Feelings
Seeking Honesty and Deeper Conversation
Affirmation of the Current Relationship
Internal Monologue of Perceived Unspoken Love
Sudden Interruption and Confrontational Inquiry
Accusation and Defensive Stance
Attempt to De-escalate and Initial Refusal
Accusation of Heartbreak and Questioning Conclusions
Declaration of Possessiveness and Protectiveness
Confession of Love Trigger and Reassurance
Brotherly Reconciliation and Movie Invitation
Flashback of Budding Romance and Anticipation
Marriage Proposal and Acceptance

sub_scenes.title: Business vs. Love and Carrie's Decision
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene explores the conflict between business priorities and personal feelings, focusing on Fred's explanation of his actions and Carrie's angry reaction, leading to her decision.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern and Misinterpretation Regarding Dave's Feelings
Clarification of Misunderstanding and Business Motives
Revelation of Selfishness and Business Priority
Angry Accusation of Deception and Trickery
Desperate Plea and Rejection of Affection
Internal Reflection on Suspicion and Motivation
Confrontation and Inquiry about Intentions

sub_scenes.title: Carlton Confrontation and Emotional Fallout
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie's confrontation with Mr. Carlton, her assertion of independence, and the subsequent emotional fallout, leading to reconciliation with Dave.

narrative_arcs.title: Anticipation and Impatience Before Confrontation
Direct Confrontation with Mr. Carlton
Accusation of Trickery and Business Betrayal
Defiant Assertion of Independence and Self-Reliance
Emotional Aftermath and Reflection of Foolishness
Reconciliation and Comfort in Affection

sub_scenes.title: Lingering Emotions and Final Decisions
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Carrie's mixed emotions and final decision to leave the West, followed by a reunion with Dave and a clarifying conversation about their feelings and future.

narrative_arcs.title: Relief and Lingering Pain After Decision
Distant Reunion in Town After Weeks Apart
Inquiry and Confirmation of Love
Riding Back and Discussing Past and Present Feelings

Major_Arcs.title: Chris and Rance's Story and Dirk's Fate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the story of Chris and Rance, intertwined with Dirk's fate, covering themes of love, duty, and justice in a dramatic western setting, culminating in a wedding disrupted by past actions.

sub_scenes.title: Sickness, Worry, and Fatherly Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie's illness and worry, her father's intervention, and a confrontation related to a beef contract, adding layers of family and business conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern and Arrival of Visitors
Father's Scolding about Beef Contract
Confrontation and Unhappiness Regarding a Promise
Reflection, Embrace, and Reconciliation

sub_scenes.title: Urgent Summons and Discovery of Injury
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to Chris and Dirk's story, starting with an urgent summons and the discovery of Dirk's gunshot wound, setting up a medical emergency and investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: Bedroom Interruption and Urgent Summons
Discovery of Gunshot Wound and Reassurance

sub_scenes.title: Investigation and Marshal's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces an investigation into Dirk's fight and the arrival of Marshal Rance Cready at the ranch, escalating tensions and setting up a ranch confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion about Dirk's Fight and Empty Gun
Marshal Rance Cready's Arrival and Ranch Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Duty vs. Compassion and Rescue Planning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the moral conflict faced by the Marshal, balancing duty with compassion for Dirk, leading to a decision to stay and plan a rescue operation.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern for Injured Man and Introduction of Dirk's Situation
Debate on Duty, Justice, and Decision to Stay for Dirk

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Reconciliation and Urgent Escape
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts romantic reconciliation between Chris and Rance, quickly followed by an urgent plea to rescue Dirk and the initiation of escape plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Reconciliation after Argument
Urgent Plea to Rescue Dirk
Contemplating Rescue Strategy and Legal Implications

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit, Confrontation, and Moral Dilemma
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the escape attempt, persistent pursuit, direct confrontation with the Marshal, and the moral dilemma of dealing with the injured lawman.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape and Pursuit Begins
Failed Evasion and Pursuit Persistence
Confrontation, Shooting, and Aid
Disagreement on Fate of the Marshal

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Love Confession, and Rance's Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dirk and Chris's departure, Dirk's confession of love for Rance, and Rance's angry and resigned reaction to Dirk's successful escape.

narrative_arcs.title: Departure and Difficult Decision
Confession of Love and Understanding
Rance's Defiance and Acceptance of Escape

sub_scenes.title: Rance's Recovery and Wedding Day Interruption
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Rance's recovery, his father's relief, and a doctor's visit, culminating in Chris and Rance's romantic resolution and a marriage proposal, only to be dramatically interrupted on their wedding day by Dirk.

narrative_arcs.title: Rance's Awakening and Father's Relief
Doctor's Inquiry and Father's Explanation
Confession and Proposal
Mary and Chris's Confessions and Fears
Wedding Day is Here, but Dirk is Missing
Dirk Interrupts the Wedding and Confrontation
Marshal's Plan, Dirk's Capture and Backstory Revealed
